/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees on both sides, their leaves forming a canopy overhead. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. On the right side of the street, there's a building with a red roof, adding a pop of color to the scene. The image appears to have been taken during the day, as the sunlight filters through the leaves of the trees, casting dappled shadows on the street.
